# Enable or Disable Categories

Account administrators can view all notification categories on the **Notifications** > **Configuration** page.  See [Notification categories](./#notification_types) to learn about the different categories supported by the platform.

By default, all notification categories are enabled, which means that the recipients mapped to these categories will receive an email when a specific event occurs.&#x20;

Administrators can stop unwanted notifications by disabling a notification category. Once disabled, the recipients configured for the specific category will no longer receive emails.&#x20;

{% hint style="info" %}
* The Marketplace Platform doesn't allow disabling email notifications for your profile updates, including emails related to password resets and account invitations.
* Disabled notification categories can be re-enabled if needed.&#x20;
{% endhint %}

## Enabling or disabling a notification category

Follow these steps to enable or disable a specific notification category:

{% hint style="info" %}
The steps in this section are for account administrators to manage categories at the account level. If you are not an administrator, follow the steps in [Manage Email Notifications](../../../marketplace-platform/getting-started/interface/manage-notification-preferences.md) to enable or disable a category for your profile.
{% endhint %}

1. From the main menu, go to **Settings** > **Notifications** and select the **Configuration** tab.
2. Select the required category, for example, **Agreements**.
3. Click the down arrow <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">in the upper right and select **Enable** or **Disable**, depending on the available option.
4. Add your comments in the **Notes** field and click **Enable** or **Disable**. The following image shows the **Disable category** dialog, which appears when you select **Disable**.

<figure><img src="../../../.gitbook/assets/notifications_disable.png" alt=""><figcaption><p>Disable category dialog</p></figcaption></figure>

A confirmation message is displayed, and the **Configuration** tab displays the updated status of the category.
